header.description: Provides mobile support for working with iOS. Refer to the ios_plugin.pdf file, which is embedded in the plug-in .zip file for more documentation.

step-type.name: UI Test
step-type.description: Runs the specified UI test against the application.

property-ui.label: Application
property-ui.description: The iOS application (.app or .ipa) to test.

property-ui.label: Test Script
property-ui.description: The test script file (.js) to run.

property-ui.label: Output Directory
property-ui.description: The directory where the test output should be written to.

property-ui.label: Device Target
property-ui.description: The target device to run the test against, for example, iPhone - Simulator - iOS 7.1.

property-ui.label: Path To Xcode
property-ui.description: The path to the Xcode installation. If the value is not specified, a default value of /Applications/Xcode.app is used.

property-ui.label: Trace Template
property-ui.description: The path, relative to the Xcode installation path, for the .tracetemplate file to use when running the UI test. If no value is specified, a default value of /Contents/Applications/Instruments.app/Contents/PlugIns/ AutomationInstrument.bundle/Contents/Resources/ Automation.tracetemplate is used.

property-ui.label: Path To xcrun
property-ui.description: The path to the xcrun tool. If the value is not specified, the value from the system path is used.

property-ui.label: Timeout
property-ui.description: A timeout (in milliseconds), after which the UI test are stopped. By default, the step does not time out when no value is specified.

step-type.name: Start Simulator
step-type.description: Starts a simulator. The step fails if a simulator is already running.

property-ui.label: Device Type
property-ui.description: The simulator device type, for example, iPad or iPhone.

property-ui.label: Target OS
property-ui.description: The target OS or SDK version, for example, 6.1 or 7.1.

property-ui.label: Path To Xcode
property-ui.description: The path to the Xcode installation. If the value is not specified, a default value of /Applications/Xcode.app is used.

step-type.name: Stop Simulator
step-type.description: Stops the running simulator. The step fails if no simulator is running.
